alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Montgomery and northwestern Harris Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cypress, or near Jersey Village, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tomball, The Woodlands, Spring, Oak Ridge North, Splashtown, Willowbrook, Cypress and Hooks Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
